verses.verse: And as Jesus passed <S%G3855><s%> by, he saw <S%G1492><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which was blind <S%G5185><s%> from his birth. <S%G1079><s%>

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G4461><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> did sin, <S%G264><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man, or <S%G2228><s%> his parents, <S%G1118><s%> that he was born <S%G1080><s%> blind? <S%G5185><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> has this <S%G3778><s%> man sinned, <S%G264><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> his parents: <S%G1118><s%> but that the works <S%G2041><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> in him.

I must <S%G1163><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me, while <S%G2193><s%> it is day: <S%G2250><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> work. <S%G2038><s%>
As long <S%G3752><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

When he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he spat <S%G4429><s%> on <S%G5476><s%> the ground, <S%G5476><s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> clay <S%G4081><s%> of the spittle, <S%G4427><s%> and he anointed <S%G2025><s%> <S%G1909><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%> man with the clay, <S%G4081><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Go, <S%G5217><s%> wash <S%G3538><s%> in the pool <S%G2861><s%> of Siloam, <S%G4611><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> is by interpretation, <S%G2059><s%> Sent. <S%G649><s%>) He went <S%G565><s%> his way therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and washed, <S%G3538><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> seeing. <S%G991><s%>

The neighbors <S%G1069><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and they which before <S%G4386><s%> had seen <S%G2334><s%> him that he was blind, <S%G5185><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> he that sat <S%G2521><s%> and begged? <S%G4319><s%>
Some <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is he: others <S%G243><s%> said, He is like <S%G3664><s%> him: but he said, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> he.
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they to him, How <S%G4459><s%> were your <S%G4675><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> opened? <S%G455><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> A man <S%G444><s%> that is called <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> clay, <S%G4081><s%> and anointed <S%G2025><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to me, Go <S%G5217><s%> to the pool <S%G2861><s%> of Siloam, <S%G4611><s%> and wash: <S%G3538><s%> and I went <S%G565><s%> and washed, <S%G3538><s%> and I received <S%G308><s%> sight. <S%G308><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, Where <S%G4226><s%> is he? He said, <S%G3004><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not.
They brought <S%G71><s%> to the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> him that aforetime <S%G4218><s%> was blind. <S%G5185><s%>
And it was the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> the clay, <S%G4081><s%> and opened <S%G455><s%> his eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> him how <S%G4459><s%> he had received <S%G308><s%> his sight. <S%G308><s%> He said <S%G2036><s%> to them, He put <S%G2007><s%> clay <S%G4081><s%> on my <S%G3450><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and I washed, <S%G3538><s%> and do see. <S%G991><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is not of God, <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he keeps <S%G5083><s%> not the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day. Others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> that is a sinner <S%G268><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> miracles? <S%G4592><s%> And there was a division <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them.

They say <S%G3004><s%> to the blind <S%G5185><s%> man again, <S%G3825><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you of him, that he has opened <S%G455><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eyes? <S%G3788><s%> He said, <S%G2036><s%> He is a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

But the Jews <S%G2453><s%> did not believe <S%G4100><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> him, that he had been <S%G2258><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> and received <S%G308><s%> his sight, <S%G308><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> they called <S%G5455><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> of him that had received <S%G308><s%> his sight. <S%G308><s%>

And they asked <S%G2065><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Is this <S%G3778><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> you say <S%G3004><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> blind? <S%G5185><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> does he now <S%G737><s%> see? <S%G991><s%>

His parents <S%G1118><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G2036><s%> We know <S%G1492><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is our son, <S%G5207><s%> and that he was born <S%G1080><s%> blind: <S%G5185><s%>

But by what <S%G4459><s%> means <S%G4459><s%> he now <S%G3568><s%> sees, <S%G991><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> not; or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has opened <S%G455><s%> his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> not: he is of age; <S%G2244><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> him: he shall speak <S%G2980><s%> for himself. <S%G848><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> words spoke <S%G2036><s%> his parents, <S%G1118><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> the Jews: <S%G2453><s%> for the Jews <S%G2453><s%> had agreed <S%G4934><s%> already, <S%G2235><s%> that if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man did confess <S%G3670><s%> that he was Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he should be put out of the synagogue. <S%G656><s%>
Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> his parents, <S%G1118><s%> He is of age; <S%G2244><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1208><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> they the man <S%G444><s%> that was blind, <S%G5185><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Give <S%G1325><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the praise: <S%G1391><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Whether <S%G1487><s%> he be a sinner <S%G268><s%> or no, I know <S%G1492><s%> not: one <S%G1520><s%> thing I know, <S%G1492><s%> that, whereas I was blind, <S%G5185><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I see. <S%G991><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him again, <S%G3825><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> he to you? how <S%G4459><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> he your <S%G4675><s%> eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> them, I have told <S%G2036><s%> you already, <S%G2235><s%> and you did not hear: <S%G191><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> it again? <S%G3825><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> be his disciples? <S%G3101><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> they reviled <S%G3058><s%> him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> his disciple; <S%G3101><s%> but we are Moses' <S%G3475><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
We know <S%G1492><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to Moses: <S%G3475><s%> as for this <S%G5126><s%> fellow, we know <S%G1492><s%> not from where <S%G4159><s%> he is.

The man <S%G444><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G1063><s%> herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is a marvelous <S%G2298><s%> thing, that you know <S%G1492><s%> not from where <S%G4159><s%> he is, and yet he has opened <S%G455><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> not sinners: <S%G268><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man be a worshipper <S%G2318><s%> of God, <S%G2318><s%> and does <S%G4160><s%> his will, <S%G2307><s%> him he hears. <S%G191><s%>

Since <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> began was it not heard <S%G191><s%> that any <S%G5100><s%> man opened <S%G455><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of one that was born <S%G1080><s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man were not of God, <S%G2316><s%> he could <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You were altogether <S%G3650><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> in sins, <S%G266><s%> and do you teach <S%G1321><s%> us? And they cast <S%G1544><s%> him out.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that they had cast <S%G1544><s%> him out; and when he had found <S%G2147><s%> him, he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Do you believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>
He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is he, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that I might believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him?
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You have both <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> him, and it is he that talks <S%G2980><s%> with you.
And he said, <S%G5346><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I believe. <S%G4100><s%> And he worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> For judgment <S%G2917><s%> I am come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> that they which see <S%G991><s%> not might see; <S%G991><s%> and that they which see <S%G991><s%> might be made <S%G1096><s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>
And some of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were with him heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> words, and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are we blind <S%G5185><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, If <S%G1487><s%> you were blind, <S%G5185><s%> you should have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sin: <S%G266><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> We see; <S%G991><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> remains. <S%G3306><s%>
